name: Bouncing Chick
description:
Super addictive, casual game. Easy to learn, hard to master!

One finger tap control. Can the lovely chick beat the evil gorilla? Come and try, come back and tell us about your achievements. Get rewards and buffs to help you jump further. Beat the evil gorilla, now!

Features
※12 different characters, 6 powerful bosses.
※Explore various skills.
※Randomized levels provide a unique experience each time.
※Play together with friends on the same screen.

For more details, please check our Facebook
Page: https://www.facebook.com/SoulGameFans
